name: Tiny
long_description:
Tiny is the operating system for factories. Our mission is to provide factories with a single, cohesive platform to track and manage the full lifecycle of an order across every department in the organization. 

Our first module, the Sales Quotation module, helps sales and engineering teams respond to quotes faster and more accurately. Weâ€™re already working with several factories in Southeast Asia, focusing on suppliers in the automotive and electronics industries.
